Package database

Class TableSchema

  • java.lang.Object
    • database.TableSchema

  • public class TableSchema
extends java.lang.Object

    Title: TableSchema

    Description: Database table structure.

    Copyright: Copyright (c) 2017

    Company: Dipartimento di Informatica, Università degli studi di Bari

    Class description: This class represents the structure of a single database table.

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Pier

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      TableSchema​(DbAccess db, java.lang.String tableName)
      This constructor method sets the database used to extract the structure of the table "tableName" and extracts the structure of itself.

    • Constructor Detail

      • TableSchema

        public TableSchema​(DbAccess db,
                   java.lang.String tableName)
            throws java.sql.SQLException
        This constructor method sets the database used to extract the structure of the table "tableName" and extracts the structure of itself.
        Parameters:
        db - Database used to extract the structure.
        tableName - Name of the table in the database from which extract the structure.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - Throws a SQLException in case a SQL error occurs.

    • Method Detail

      • getColumn

        public TableSchema.Column getColumn​(int index)
        This method returns the attribute at column "index".
        Parameters:
        index - Index of the column in the database table.
        Returns:
        Attribute located at "index" column in the database table.
